mapper.insert: insert into logistics_deliveryreceipt (deliveryReceiptID, startCity, endCity, midCity, makeDtae, State, COMMENT) values (#{deliveryreceiptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makedtae,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update logistics_deliveryreceipt set startCity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, makeDtae = #{makedtae,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, State = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliveryReceiptID = #{deliveryreceiptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select deliveryReceiptID, startCity, endCity, midCity, makeDtae, State, COMMENT from logistics_deliveryreceipt
